_rawTooltip.fullTooltip: Yunara’s critical strikes deal an additional [[0]].

[[0]] Yunara’s attacks deal an additional [[1]] On-Hit. Launching an attack generates 1 Unleash (max 8), increased to 2 when attacking a champion. Not attacking for 6 seconds causes Yunara to lose 1 Unleash every 0.5 seconds.

[[2]] Yunara unleashes her inner potential for 5 seconds: gains [[3]], her attacks deal an additional [[4]] [[5]], and her attacks spread to nearby enemies, dealing [[6]]. Spread attacks critically strike if the initiating attack was a critical strike or hit a structure with a rolled critical strike. Spread attacks deal 250% damage to minions below 30% HP and apply [[7]] effects and [[8]] at 30% effectiveness.

[[0]] Yunara fires a spinning prayer bead that slows near enemies and lingers/expands at its endpoint. Initial hit deals [[1]] and [[2]] by 99% decaying over 1.5 seconds, then deals an additional [[3]] per second to enemies in area.

[[4]] Yunara fires a laser dealing [[5]] + [[6]] and [[7]] by 99% decaying over 1 second.

W.cooldown: Arc of Judgment/Arc of Ruin – 10/5 seconds
W.name: Arc of Judgment / Arc of Ruin

_rawTooltip.fullTooltip:
[[0]] Yunara becomes Ghosted and gains [[1]] (increased to 90% toward champion) decaying over 1.5 seconds.

[[2]] Yunara dashes in a direction at dash speed 1350/1500/1650 (depending on R rank), can go over walls.

Yunara enters a Transcendent state for 15 seconds: Q is automatically activated for its duration; W is upgraded to Arc of Ruin with 50% reduced cooldown; E is upgraded to Untouchable Shadow with cooldown refreshed.

Change.After: Fixed a bug where sometimes the bounce could trigger multiple stacks per bounce for some items. It's intended for Yunara to build 1 stack per bounce.

Fixed an issue where sometimes items would fail to do damage on Q bounces in situations where a significant number of bounces were taking place. (The poros on the calculators behind the scenes are ready now)

Fixed an issue where items like Runnan's Hurricane were dealing full on-hit damage when bouncing from the secondary target to the primary target, triggering the full-on hit value multiple times in a single auto.
Fixed an issue where Runnan's Hurricane bolts were having their on-hit damage reduced incorrectly and will now apply the full on-hit damage correctly.
